appear."},{"lineNumber":251497,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな絶望していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone was in hopeless."},{"lineNumber":251499,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251500,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日、ガルティア率いる部隊が現れた、こちらの軍の３倍の兵力。","translatedEnglishLine":"The next appeared and arrogantly asked, food or life?"},{"lineNumber":251502,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイアスとウスピラが対応している、今戦うのは危険だ、ガルティアに勝てるすべが無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Saias and Uspira are responding; fighting now is dangerous, there is no way to defeat Galtia."},{"lineNumber":251503,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、我々までは屈服すると南西方面の全ての軍が・・","translatedEnglishLine":"However, if even we surrender, all the troops in Hmm.'"},{ "lineNumber":251505,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと良い作戦を考えたのだが、今すぐには無理か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought of a pretty good plan, but it might not be possible right now..."},{"lineNumber":251506,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":251507,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　食べ物を渡して時間を稼ぐ","translatedEnglishLine":"> Give food to buy time"},{"lineNumber":251508,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　正々堂々と戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight fair and square"},{"lineNumber":251509,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは断ると使者に伝える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance tells the messenger that he refuses."},{"lineNumber":251510,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス軍と一緒に魔軍と戦います。","translatedEnglishLine":"We will fight the Demon Army together with the Zeth forces."},{"lineNumber":251511,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸＸ平原での戦い、サイアス、ウスピラも活躍。","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle at the XXX plains, with Saias and Uspira also playing active roles."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで・・・元に戻れる・・てならないのか、くそっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this... shouldn't it be possible to return to normal? Damn it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("法王権限未使用")==1){
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("Papal Authority Not Used") == 1){

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは心の中で考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: KuruKuu thought to himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱出方法は無い、いずれ・・溶かされてしまう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no way out; eventually... we will be melted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いざとなったら、あの約束を使うしかないかと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the time comes, we might have no choice but to use that promise...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらにしばらく歩くが、もう駄目だよと誰かが諦め座り込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After walking a bit more, someone gives up saying it's no use and sits down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次々とそれは連鎖する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One after another, it becomes a chain reaction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、まだ元気。ん・・そうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is still energetic. Hmm... that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくみるとみんな裸だな、よし、ここはスーパー乱交パーティといこう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking closely, everyone is naked. Alright, let's have a super orgy party here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチな事をすると気分転換になっていいアイデアが浮かぶぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing naughty things is a good change of pace and will bring out good ideas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、男どもは向こうにいってろ、みんな邪魔だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, guys, go over there. You're all in the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな事をしている場合じゃないだろうと怒る子もいるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some get angry, saying this isn't the time for such things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、異界ゲートが開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a gate to another world opened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れたのは　ミステリアとルーシー（どちらも初です）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Appearing were Mysteria and Lucy (both appearing for the first time).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隠居しているので助けるつもりは無かったのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had been retired and had no intention to help,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占いでそれを知ったルーシーに助けないさいと懇願されてしかたなくきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Lucy, knowing this through fortune-telling, begged them to help, so they reluctantly came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルは当然ミステリアは知っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle of course knows Mysteria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Capital

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミステリアが開けてくれた異界ゲートによりなんとか脱出してランス達は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the gate to another world opened by Mysteria, Rance and the others somehow escaped and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに戻って来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: returned here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミステリアとルーシーの紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Introduction of Mysteria and Lucy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーシー：お菓子大好き、ガルティアのせいでお菓子工場が食い潰され怒っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lucy: Loves sweets; she's angry because Galtia destroyed the candy factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミステリア、どんな風に見せていくかは任せる、かっこよく頼むね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mysteria: I leave how to present her up to you; please make her look cool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック、千鶴子も居ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Chizuko are also here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは次は勝つと再びガルティアの居る最前線に行くと宣言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance declares he will win next time and will go again to the frontlines where Galtia is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日一日だけここに泊まった明日出発
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They stayed here only for today and will depart tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その晩、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっそり帰ってきたアニスは、千鶴子の独り言を勘違い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis, who secretly returned, misunderstood Chizuko's muttering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが千鶴子を抱く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Rance is embracing Chizuko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真実を知り呆れた千鶴子、もうアニスを怒る気にもなれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowing the truth, a dumbfounded Chizuko no longer feels like getting angry at Anis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：千鶴子のエロ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Erotic scene of Chizuko>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、ランスが旅立つ時にはマジックは出迎えに来てくれたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, when Rance departed, Magic came to see him off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子とアニスは来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Chizuko and Anis did not come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたのかしら、千鶴子と心配がるマジックだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic was worried, wondering what happened to Chizuko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にやにやして出発していくランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while Rance departed with a sly grin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸ草原、炎軍、氷軍の陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XXX Plains, positions of the Flame Army and Ice Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアス、ウスピラの状況説明の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Saias and Uspira explaining the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが無事なのが分かり、こちらに再度向かっているのを聞いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They learned that Rance was safe and heard that he was heading back here again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご無事でなによりです、二人はランス達の無事はうれしいが、状況はより危険になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Glad they are safe; the two were happy about Rance and the others being safe, but the situation had become more dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切り札であるランス達が破れた事でゼス軍の士気はさらに下がった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With their trump card Rance and his group defeated, the morale of the Zeth army fell even further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の守備隊がガルティアの要求を断る事が出来ずに食べ物を奪われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defense units everywhere are unable to refuse Galtia's demands and have their food stolen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここの主力部隊にも脱走兵すら出だしている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even in the main forces here, deserters have started to appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな絶望していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone was in despair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが戻ってきても、もう駄目かもしれないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even with Rance returning, some thought it might already be hopeless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、ガルティア率いる部隊が現れた、こちらの軍の３倍の兵力。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, a unit led by Galtia appeared, having three times the troops of our army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアの部下が現れ、横柄に聞いてくる　食か生かを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia's subordinate appeared and arrogantly asked, food or life?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアスとウスピラが対応している、今戦うのは危険だ、ガルティアに勝てるすべが無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saias and Uspira are responding; fighting now is dangerous, there is no way to defeat Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、我々までは屈服すると南西方面の全ての軍が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, if even we surrender, all the troops in the southwest region...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが現れる、奴らが来たのか。うむむ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance appears, 'They came, huh? Hmm.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと良い作戦を考えたのだが、今すぐには無理か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought of a pretty good plan, but it might not be possible right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　食べ物を渡して時間を稼ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Give food to buy time

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　正々堂々と戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight fair and square

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは断ると使者に伝える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tells the messenger that he refuses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍と一緒に魔軍と戦います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will fight the Demon Army together with the Zeth forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸ平原での戦い、サイアス、ウスピラも活躍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle at the XXX plains, with Saias and Uspira also playing active roles.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで・・・元に戻れる・・てならないのか、くそっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this... shouldn't it be possible to return to normal? Damn it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("法王権限未使用")==1){
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("Papal Authority Not Used") == 1){

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは心の中で考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: KuruKuu thought to himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱出方法は無い、いずれ・・溶かされてしまう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no way out; eventually... we will be melted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いざとなったら、あの約束を使うしかないかと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the time comes, we might have no choice but to use that promise...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらにしばらく歩くが、もう駄目だよと誰かが諦め座り込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After walking a bit more, someone gives up saying it's no use and sits down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次々とそれは連鎖する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One after another, it becomes a chain reaction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、まだ元気。ん・・そうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is still energetic. Hmm... that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくみるとみんな裸だな、よし、ここはスーパー乱交パーティといこう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking closely, everyone is naked. Alright, let's have a super orgy party here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチな事をすると気分転換になっていいアイデアが浮かぶぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing naughty things is a good change of pace and will bring out good ideas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、男どもは向こうにいってろ、みんな邪魔だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, guys, go over there. You're all in the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな事をしている場合じゃないだろうと怒る子もいるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some get angry, saying this isn't the time for such things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、異界ゲートが開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a gate to another world opened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れたのは　ミステリアとルーシー（どちらも初です）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Appearing were Mysteria and Lucy (both appearing for the first time).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隠居しているので助けるつもりは無かったのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had been retired and had no intention to help,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占いでそれを知ったルーシーに助けないさいと懇願されてしかたなくきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Lucy, knowing this through fortune-telling, begged them to help, so they reluctantly came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルは当然ミステリアは知っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle of course knows Mysteria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Capital

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミステリアが開けてくれた異界ゲートによりなんとか脱出してランス達は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the gate to another world opened by Mysteria, Rance and the others somehow escaped and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに戻って来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: returned here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミステリアとルーシーの紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Introduction of Mysteria and Lucy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーシー：お菓子大好き、ガルティアのせいでお菓子工場が食い潰され怒っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lucy: Loves sweets; she's angry because Galtia destroyed the candy factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミステリア、どんな風に見せていくかは任せる、かっこよく頼むね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mysteria: I leave how to present her up to you; please make her look cool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック、千鶴子も居ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Chizuko are also here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは次は勝つと再びガルティアの居る最前線に行くと宣言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance declares he will win next time and will go again to the frontlines where Galtia is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日一日だけここに泊まった明日出発
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They stayed here only for today and will depart tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その晩、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっそり帰ってきたアニスは、千鶴子の独り言を勘違い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis, who secretly returned, misunderstood Chizuko's muttering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが千鶴子を抱く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Rance is embracing Chizuko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真実を知り呆れた千鶴子、もうアニスを怒る気にもなれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowing the truth, a dumbfounded Chizuko no longer feels like getting angry at Anis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：千鶴子のエロ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Erotic scene of Chizuko>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、ランスが旅立つ時にはマジックは出迎えに来てくれたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, when Rance departed, Magic came to see him off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子とアニスは来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Chizuko and Anis did not come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたのかしら、千鶴子と心配がるマジックだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic was worried, wondering what happened to Chizuko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にやにやして出発していくランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while Rance departed with a sly grin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸ草原、炎軍、氷軍の陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XXX Plains, positions of the Flame Army and Ice Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアス、ウスピラの状況説明の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Saias and Uspira explaining the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが無事なのが分かり、こちらに再度向かっているのを聞いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They learned that Rance was safe and heard that he was heading back here again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご無事でなによりです、二人はランス達の無事はうれしいが、状況はより危険になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Glad they are safe; the two were happy about Rance and the others being safe, but the situation had become more dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切り札であるランス達が破れた事でゼス軍の士気はさらに下がった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With their trump card Rance and his group defeated, the morale of the Zeth army fell even further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の守備隊がガルティアの要求を断る事が出来ずに食べ物を奪われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defense units everywhere are unable to refuse Galtia's demands and have their food stolen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここの主力部隊にも脱走兵すら出だしている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even in the main forces here, deserters have started to appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな絶望していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone was in despair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが戻ってきても、もう駄目かもしれないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even with Rance returning, some thought it might already be hopeless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、ガルティア率いる部隊が現れた、こちらの軍の３倍の兵力。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, a unit led by Galtia appeared, having three times the troops of our army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアの部下が現れ、横柄に聞いてくる　食か生かを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia's subordinate appeared and arrogantly asked, food or life?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアスとウスピラが対応している、今戦うのは危険だ、ガルティアに勝てるすべが無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saias and Uspira are responding; fighting now is dangerous, there is no way to defeat Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、我々までは屈服すると南西方面の全ての軍が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, if even we surrender, all the troops in the southwest region...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが現れる、奴らが来たのか。うむむ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance appears, 'They came, huh? Hmm.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと良い作戦を考えたのだが、今すぐには無理か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought of a pretty good plan, but it might not be possible right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　食べ物を渡して時間を稼ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Give food to buy time

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　正々堂々と戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight fair and square

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは断ると使者に伝える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tells the messenger that he refuses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍と一緒に魔軍と戦います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will fight the Demon Army together with the Zeth forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸＸ平原での戦い、サイアス、ウスピラも活躍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle at the XXX plains, with Saias and Uspira also playing active roles.
